title: Which of one of Taric's skins would look the best once he's reworked?
body: My money is on his Bloodstone outfit. Scary Taric would be awesome, especially if he has different voice lines.

replies.body:
Best is subjective.

Most _Fabulous_ - 5th Age

Most_ Badass_ - Blood stone
I love all of the new skins for different reasons :)
Will Emerald skin be... insightful?
Emerald Taric will be.....awesome :P

He will 100% be more then just a recolor. 

Much like how we updated Frozen & Yellow Jacket Shen, we will be doing the same thing for Emerald and 5th Age Taric.
Now I'm hyped

But 5th age isn't technically a recolor, is it? He's half naked.
Is that just textures?
Just textures, though honestly if it were up to me for hilarity sake, he'd look more like a pink He-Man.

http://imgur.com/EdsZTnd.jpg
http://imgur.com/eMt6Hwzb.jpg
http://imgur.com/WTBwPUMb.jpg
Oh please, tell me the new Bloodstone Taric is gonna be badasser than anything in league!

You will have to wait and see ;)

Are goal is definitely to make Bloodstone the "badass" Taric skin!

> You will have to wait and see ;)
> 
> Are goal is definitely to make Bloodstone the "badass" Taric skin!

xD

As a guy who own all of Taric's skin and the fact that you said all of them are beloved for different reason, when are we going to get a select random skin button because I can not deal with the choice of picking one Taric over another let the fate decides.

So they are basically finished, eh?
Say, will Armor of the 5th Age Taric be...outrageous?
Truly!

I disagree... 5th Age is both the most Fabulous and the most Badass. The dude is running around wrecking face in fluffy pink boots and wearing a tiara with his all pink armor... there is nothing subjective about it, 5th Age is most bestest skin ever.
Armor of the 5th Age Taric obviously

isnt it obvious https://www.google.com/imgres?imgurl=http://i.imgur.com/14yeCnk.png&imgrefurl=http://rebrn.com/re/when-taric-uses-shatter-his-armor-should-burst-off-his-body-550008/&h=1016&w=610&tbnid=PstX21qavTqPsM:&docid=KEWyKQ0scLPm8M&ei=pZmyVrewN8bSjAOk_L3wAQ&tbm=isch&ved=0ahUKEwj3lu_H69zKAhVGKWMKHSR-Dx4QMwhLKCcwJw
Armor of the fifth age, duh!
Always Emerald.

I want bloodstone to be...but what if it's AOTFAT...
Plus could there be a paladin Taric...? Wait no copyright issues and stuff
Taric is already inherently a paladin. CC/Heals/Damage. Just get the Emerald skin if you want to be full manmode.

> [{quoted}](name=Satanstein,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=c8730YLi,comment-id=000a0001,timestamp=2016-02-05T04:13:16.279+0000)

Sheild of Valoran, not damage focused.

>
> AOTFAT?
Armor Of The Fifth Age Taric. That's my name for the skin
Funny...Bloodstone ended up being the most hideous and fruity looking skin (and not in a good way) that Taric has even though it's supposed to look badass? That artist truly missed the mark imo

My guess would be bloodmoon, because it is the most promising concept as it is now for a cool skin.
Kinda like how it went with Sion, he had some meh skins and then there was Warmonger.
Warmonger's awesome now and the rest still look meh (compared to default/wamonger, Sion improved a TON with his rework, just to clarify)
{{summoner:31}}
Bloodstone Taric, easily. Look at his hair...LOOK AT IT! You just don't get that kind of volume.
Original, cus his cape is outrageous. Andy word on the rework yet?
I cant pick one Im most excited to see. I own them all and love Taric so Im so excited to see the new splash for all of them.

Currently? Blood Stone Taric. Eventually? El Nature Boy Taric. I've created an artistic rendering with my insane Photoshop (read: MS Word) skills.

http://imgur.com/apEuOA1

Every Taric skin will be gorgeous. No exceptions. 
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Yf_Lwe6p-Cg
The splash art of Bloodstone taric was always amazing, the facial expression he has in that is really badass.
Then you see it in game {{sticker:zombie-nunu-tears}}
splash art wise i would say bs as he will look more like bs liss, but i hope my emerald taric gets a lot of love
i dunno, if they make him gayer. fifth age. otherwise it'd be bloodstone
